message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $12,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I really like the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $9,250.  This leaves room for both of us to get a good deal. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'd be willing to go up to $9,000, but no more than that. I'm trying to get the best deal possible.
